title: The Minerals That Drive Trump’s Global Agenda
description: From Canada to Pakistan, an interest in critical minerals is a through line in the White House’s foreign policy.
content: What connects the White Houses approach to Pakistan and Panama, with a thread running through Canada, Greenland, and Ukraine? The answer could lie not in a grand theory of international relations but… [+19489 chars]
